name: Now! That's What I Call Music: Dance & Sing
overview: NOW That's What I call Music! Dance & Sing is the first and only Dance & Sing game for Wii. Challenging and fun, the game features 30 original tracks from the biggest artists of the year including massive 16 UK No.1 hits. Packed full of brilliantly choreographed dance routines, progressive difficulty levels, and 5 exclusive Hip-Hop tracks to help you master your moves! Play single, multi-player or dance-off modes. Sing like the stars and boost your career, or throw down a challenge to family and friends! With 3 Game Modes: Dance, Sing and Career Path, the fun starts here!
